<title level="1" right="Rules">[Triggering Snares](/Rules.aspx?ID=3318)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 297 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Unless stated otherwise in a snare's description, when a Small or larger creature enters a snare's square, the snare's effect occurs, and then the snare is destroyed.

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Triggering Snares
